title: Privacy Policy
intro: We take data protection seriously. This policy explains how we collect and use personal data.

sections.title: Data we collect
items: Contact form messages and related metadata.
Technical data such as logs and device information.

sections.title: Purposes
items: Respond to requests and provide support.
Improve the service and ensure security.

sections.title: Legal bases
items: Consent for newsletters and optional communications.
Legitimate interest for security and service improvement.

sections.title: Retention
items: Data is kept for the duration of the relationship.
Contact data is kept up to 3 years after the last interaction.

sections.title: Cookies
items: We use necessary cookies for site operation.
Optional cookies are only set with your consent.
